column2:
COVID-19 negative certification is required. Entry requirements for Curaçao are the same for all travellers, regardless of COVID-19 vaccination status.
You will need to complete the digital immigration card online to enter Curaçao, 48 hours prior to your departure.
Travellers can enter Curaçao regardless of vaccination status. There are no additional requirements, except the digital immigration card.

column4: Travellers can enter Curaçao regardless of vaccination status. There are no additional requirements, except the digital immigration card.
column5:
Latest News:

International Restrictions:
*All travellers: You will need to complete the digital immigration card online to enter Curaçao, 48 hours prior to your departure.
*If you’re fully vaccinated: Entry requirements for Curaçao are the same for all travellers, regardless of COVID-19 vaccination status.
Proof of vaccination status: You don’t need to provide proof of your vaccination status for entry to Curaçao.
*If you’re not fully vaccinated: Entry requirements for Curaçao are the same for all travellers, regardless of COVID-19 vaccination status.
If you’ve had COVID-19 in the past year: Entry requirements for Curaçao are the same for all travellers, regardless of whether you have tested positive for COVID-19 in the past year.
*If you’re transiting through Curaçao: Transiting is when you pass through one country on the way to your final destination. Check with your airline before departing.
*Transiting travellers must fill out the digital immigration card online. *Children and young people: There are no specific requirements for children and young people.
*Exemptions: There are no exemptions to the Curaçao entry requirements.


Internal Restrictions:
*Travel in Curaçao: The Government of Curaçao has put measures in place in response to the coronavirus pandemic. All measures and updates can be found on the website of the Government of Curaçao.
column6: To enter you will need to complete the digital immigration card online to enter Curaçao, 48 hours prior to your departure.
